summary: bLaCkSpIrE, A medium-large unique player home located in the pale.(can you find it?)
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=white][b][u] bLaCkSpIrE [/u][/b][/color][/size]
[size=4][color=white][b][u]Version 1.3 March 26/2013 [/u][/b][/color][/size]

[size=4][color=white][b][u]Summary:[/u][/b][/color][/size]

bLaCkSpIrE, A medium-large unique player home located in the pale.(can you find it?)

[size=4][color=white][b][u]Main Features Include:[/u][/b][/color][/size]

All crafting amenities including a chopping block.
Auto loading crafting stations will retrieve necessary items on activate and return them on exit.
Custom containers for all items in skyrim & dawnguard.
Functional atronach forge.
Fully functioning autosorting crystal (all items skyrim & dawnguard)
Working dwemer jukebox (Functional but has bugs due to scripting limitations).
Proper dragon preist mask display.
Unique daedric artifact display.
Unique dragon claw display.
Bug jar display
Several scripted bookshelves.
Several scripted potion shelves.
Bath that switches outfits for 55 followers from vanilla skyrim and dawnguard(Player too).
Assorted unique displays around bLaCkSpIrE (keep a look out)
Two functioning guards to patrol your home.
Two marriageable and recruitable followers.
Teleport spell to get around skyrim quickly.(Mark, Recall, Home & call horse)
Teleport map to all major cities/settlements.
All rooms have working light switches.
Beds for 7 additional NPC's (2 are child beds)

[size=4][color=white][b][u]Where Is bLaCkSpIrE?[/u][/b][/color][/size]

This entrance is hidden deep within the pale, If you can find it its yours for free. If you want the easy way in, you can buy the teleport spell tome from the riverwood trader for approximately 40,000-150,000 gold depending on your skills.
If you do manage to find the home youself you will be rewarded with a free copy of the spell tome.

[size=4][color=white][b][u]Requirements:[/u][/b][/color][/size]

Skyrim
Update(Version 1.8.151.0.7 Minimum)
Dawnguard

[size=4][color=white][b][u]NPC Information:[/u][/b][/color][/size]

Thyden -
Sex: Male
Race: Nord
Class: Mage
Specializes In Illusion Magic.
Can Be Follower: Yes
Can Be Spouse: Yes

Jayden -
Sex: Female
Race: Nord
Class: Warrior
Specializes In Two-Handed Combat.
Can Be Follower: Yes
Can Be Spouse: Yes

Guards -
Sex: Male
Race: Varies
Class: Guard
Will Arrest: Yes
Can Be Follower: No
Can Be Spouse: No

[size=4][color=white][b][u]My Mod Collection:[/u][/b][/color][/size]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=132753190&searchtext=blackspire]1. bLaCkSpIrE Steam Workshop[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33861]2. bLaCkSpIrE Nexus[/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=133005294&searchtext=skyrim+safehouse]3. Skyrim Safehouse Steam Workshop [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34187]4. Skyrim Safehouse Nexus[/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9755&searchtext=hjerim+expansion]5. Hjerim Expansion Steam Workshop[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9876]6. Hjerim Expansion Nexus[/url]

If you enjoy this mod, please endorse it ;-)

[size=4][color=white][b][u]Highly Recomended Mods:[/u][/b][/color][/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10891]1. Unlimited Bookshelves[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11370]2. Spouses can live everywhere[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]3. UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10652]4. Vanilla Mannequin Script Fix[/url]

[size=6][color=red][b][u]Change-Log:[/u][/b][/color][/size]

V1.3
-Fixed Bugged jukebox music priority(Blackspire music wont override skyrim music anymore)
-Fixed broken script properties for the NPC bath scripts(hopefully for the last time :-)
-Properly cleaned mod with TESVEdit.
-Added switch to kill the water in the bath.
-Added Elder Scroll display for Blood, Sun and Dragon Scrolls.
-Added "The Bucket" for well.. you know what for ;-)
-Fixed few minor nav-mesh errors.
-Added Skyforge Items to the forge in Blackspire(Hopefully let me know how this works)

V1.2
-Added atronach forge
-Reverted bed changes from 1.1 and retextured them
-Expanded crafting area
-Added scripts for 55 NPC's to properly undress and re-dress in the bath
-Deleted mannaquins blocking ladders
-Renamed sacks in kitchen
-Added 4 mannaquins throughout the house(2 are mini)
-Added welcome book
-Tweaked lighting
-added various clutter and effects

V1.1
-Fixed missing dragon claw display
-Fixed property in daedric artifact script
-Changed all beds except players bed and tweaked around some bedroom furniture
-Added script for NPC's to remove their clothes while in the bath
-Added food storage cupboards and storage barrels in the kitchen
-Added more drapery in the display room
-Adjusted nav-mesh around display cases in an attempt to stop NPC's from opening them

[size=6][color=red][b][u]Installation:[/u][/b][/color][/size]

Step #1 - Backup Your Save Games!
Step #2 - Copy the files from the archive to your skyrim folder.(:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrim) Overwrite if asked.
Step #3 - Open your skyrim launcher and under "data files" ensure that bLaCkSpIrE1.0.esp file is checked.
Step #4 - Play the game.

[size=6][color=red][b][u]Uninstallation:[/u][/b][/color][/size]

Step #1 - Uncheck bLaCkSpIrE1.0.esp from the skyrim launcher.
Step #2 - Delete all the files associated with this mod, Using the original archive as a reference.
Step #3 - Delete all the files associated with this mod, Using the original archive as a reference.

[size=6][color=red][b][u]Troubleshooting :[/u][/b][/color][/size]

1. My mannequins are whack

Solution - I have done my best to perfect the navmesh under the mannequins, There are several bethesda bugs associated with mannequins, Most of the time placing armor into their inventory will reset their location.
I have found a mod which fixes these bugs, link is above.
If using the mannequin fix mod, changing the state of the mannequin seems to permanently lock them into position.

If anyone comes across any bugs, please let me know in the comments and I will address them asap :-)

[size=4][color=white][b][u]Credits:[/u][/b][/color][/size]

Oaristys - Modders Resource Pack - Meshes & Textures

Blary - Open Books Resource - Meshes & Textures

WillieSea - Levelers Tower - Meshes & Textures

Lillith - Weapon Rack Re-texture - Meshes & Textures

Ghaunadaur - Modders Resource Potion Racks - Meshes, Scripts & Textures.

bLaCkShAd0w - Mod Author

TESNexus.com - For Their Awsome Site

Bethesda Game Studios- For Skyrim!

[size=4][color=white][b][u]Permissions:[/u][/b][/color][/size]

Anything I have given credit to others will require their permission before re-use.
Any assets I have created can be re-used in other mods so long as I am notified and proper credit is given.
Absolutely No hosting this on other sites.
If you're looking to create a video all I ask is the you send me a link :-)
Language translation is allowed but you must notify me. I will remain the Author, And uploads to tesnexus only. Also only changed files can be uploaded, original data will still have to be downloaded here.
